What is the significance of the Eager Th: Eager Thighs brothel, run by Carmen, is situated in Vizimas Temple Quarter, near The Hairy Bear. It is a modest establishment where Carmen and her workers operate, offering services across the Temple Quarter and the dike. Carmen has protection deals with the local underworld to safeguard her workers.
What role does Carmen play in the Temple: Carmen is the madame of the Eager Thighs brothel in the Temple Quarter, managing operations and ensuring her workers safety through arrangements with the local underworld. She is usually found near the brothel, maintaining its operations.
Where is Carmen usually found in the Tem: Carmen is typically located near the Eager Thighs brothel in the Temple Quarters slums, close to The Hairy Bear. She often remains either outside the brothel or inside, overseeing its operations.
